verses.verse: וַתִּתְפַּלֵּ֤ל <WH6419> prayed חַנָּה֙ <WH2584> And Hannah וַתֹּאמַ֔ר <WH559> and said עָלַ֤ץ <WH5970> rejoiceth לִבִּי֙ <WH3820> My heart בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> in the LORD רָ֥מָה <WH7311> is exalted קַרְנִ֖י <WH7161> mine horn בַּֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> in the LORD רָ֤חַב <WH7337> is enlarged פִּי֙ <WH6310> my mouth עַל־ <WH5921> against א֣וֹיְבַ֔י <WH341> over mine enemies כִּ֥י <WH3588> Because שָׂמַ֖חְתִּי <WH8055> because I rejoice בִּישׁוּעָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH3444> in thy salvation

אֵין־ <WH369> There קָד֥וֹשׁ <WH6918> [There is] none holy כַּיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> as the LORD כִּ֣י <WH3588> Indeed אֵ֣ין <WH369> is no בִּלְתֶּ֑ךָ <WH1115> for [there is] none beside וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> one צ֖וּר <WH6697> thee neither [is there] any rock כֵּאלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> like our God

אַל־ <WH408> no תַּרְבּ֤וּ <WH7235> no more תְדַבְּרוּ֙ <WH1696> Talk גְּבֹהָ֣ה <WH1364> so exceeding גְבֹהָ֔ה <WH1364> proudly יֵצֵ֥א <WH3318> come עָתָ֖ק <WH6277> let [not] arrogancy מִפִּיכֶ֑ם <WH6310> out of your mouth כִּ֣י <WH3588> is a אֵ֤ל <WH410> [is] a God דֵּעוֹת֙ <WH1844> of knowledge יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> for the LORD [וְלֹא כ] (וְלֹ֥ו <WH3808> not ק) נִתְכְּנ֖וּ <WH8505> are weighed עֲלִלֽוֹת׃ <WH5949> and by him actions

קֶ֥שֶׁת <WH7198> The bows גִּבֹּרִ֖ים <WH1368> of the mighty men חַתִּ֑ים <WH2844> [are] broken וְנִכְשָׁלִ֖ים <WH3782> and they that stumbled אָ֥זְרוּ <WH247> are girded חָֽיִל׃ <WH2428> with strength

שְׂבֵעִ֤ים <WH7649> [They that were] full בַּלֶּ֙חֶם֙ <WH3899> themselves for bread נִשְׂכָּ֔רוּ <WH7936> have hired out וּרְעֵבִ֖ים <WH7457> and [they that were] hungry חָדֵ֑לּוּ <WH2308> ceased עַד־ <WH5704> Even עֲקָרָה֙ <WH6135> so that the barren יָלְדָ֣ה <WH3205> hath born שִׁבְעָ֔ה <WH7651> seven וְרַבַּ֥ת <WH7227> and she that hath many בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> children אֻמְלָֽלָה׃ <WH535> is waxed feeble
יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> The LORD מֵמִ֣ית <WH4191> killeth וּמְחַיֶּ֑ה <WH2421> and maketh alive מוֹרִ֥יד <WH3381> he bringeth down שְׁא֖וֹל <WH7585> to the grave וַיָּֽעַל׃ <WH5927> and bringeth up
יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> The LORD מוֹרִ֣ישׁ <WH3423> maketh poor וּמַעֲשִׁ֑יר <WH6238> and maketh rich מַשְׁפִּ֖יל <WH8213> he bringeth low אַף־ <WH637> and מְרוֹמֵֽם׃ <WH7311> lifteth up

מֵקִ֨ים <WH6965> He raiseth up מֵעָפָ֜ר <WH6083> out of the dust דָּ֗ל <WH1800> the poor מֵֽאַשְׁפֹּת֙ <WH830> from the dunghill יָרִ֣ים <WH7311> [and] lifteth up אֶבְי֔וֹן <WH34> the beggar לְהוֹשִׁיב֙ <WH3427> to set עִם־ <WH5973> with נְדִיבִ֔ים <WH5081> [them] among princes וְכִסֵּ֥א <WH3678> the throne כָב֖וֹד <WH3519> of glory יַנְחִלֵ֑ם <WH5157> and to make them inherit כִּ֤י <WH3588> for לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> [are] the LORD'S מְצֻ֣קֵי <WH4690> for the pillars אֶ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וַיָּ֥שֶׁת <WH7896> and he hath set עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> and תֵּבֵֽל׃ <WH8398> the world

רַגְלֵ֤י <WH7272> the feet [חֲסִידֹו כ] (חֲסִידָיו֙ <WH2623> godly ק) יִשְׁמֹ֔ר <WH8104> He will keep וּרְשָׁעִ֖ים <WH7563> and the wicked בַּחֹ֣שֶׁךְ <WH2822> in darkness יִדָּ֑מּוּ <WH1826> shall be silent כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for לֹ֥א <WH3808> by בְכֹ֖חַ <WH3581> for by strength יִגְבַּר־ <WH1396> prevail אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> shall no man

יְהוָ֞ה <WH3068> of the LORD יֵחַ֣תּוּ <WH5181> be broken [מְרִיבֹו כ] (מְרִיבָ֗יו <WH7378> adversary ק) [עָלֹו כ] (עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> and ק) בַּשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> out of heaven יַרְעֵ֔ם <WH7481> shall he thunder יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> upon them the LORD יָדִ֣ין <WH1777> shall judge אַפְסֵי־ <WH657> the ends אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וְיִתֶּן־ <WH5414> and he shall give עֹ֣ז <WH5797> strength לְמַלְכּ֔וֹ <WH4428> unto his king וְיָרֵ֖ם <WH7311> and exalt קֶ֥רֶן <WH7161> the horn מְשִׁיחֽוֹ׃ <WH4899> of his anointed פ

וַיֵּ֧לֶךְ <WH1980> went אֶלְקָנָ֛ה <WH511> And Elkanah הָרָמָ֖תָה <WH7414> to Ramah עַל־ <WH5921> unto בֵּית֑וֹ <WH1004> to his house וְהַנַּ֗עַר <WH5288> And the child הָיָ֤ה <WH1961> did מְשָׁרֵת֙ <WH8334> minister אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> פְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> before עֵלִ֥י <WH5941> Eli הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> the priest

וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> Now the sons עֵלִ֖י <WH5941> of Eli בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> [were] sons בְלִיָּ֑עַל <WH1100> of Belial לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not יָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> they knew אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> not the LORD

וּמִשְׁפַּ֥ט <WH4941> custom הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> And the priests' אֶת־ <WH854> with הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> with the people כָּל־ <WH3605> any אִ֞ישׁ <WH376> [was that] when any man זֹבֵ֣חַ <WH2076> offered זֶ֗בַח <WH2077> sacrifice וּבָ֨א <WH935> came נַ֤עַר <WH5288> servant הַכֹּהֵן֙ <WH3548> the priest's כְּבַשֵּׁ֣ל <WH1310> was in seething הַבָּשָׂ֔ר <WH1320> while the flesh וְהַמַּזְלֵ֛ג <WH4207> with a fleshhook שְׁלֹ֥שׁ־ <WH7969> of three הַשִּׁנַּ֖יִם <WH8127> teeth בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> in his hand

וְהִכָּ֨ה <WH5221> And he struck בַכִּיּ֜וֹר <WH3595> [it] into the pan א֣וֹ <WH176> or בַדּ֗וּד <WH1731> or kettle א֤וֹ <WH176> or בַקַּלַּ֙חַת֙ <WH7037> or caldron א֣וֹ <WH176> or בַפָּר֔וּר <WH6517> or pot כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after יַעֲלֶ֣ה <WH5927> brought up הַמַּזְלֵ֔ג <WH4207> all that the fleshhook יִקַּ֥ח <WH3947> took הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> the priest בּ֑וֹ כָּ֚כָה <WH3602> Thus יַעֲשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> for himself So they did לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> unto all the Israelites הַבָּאִ֥ים <WH935> that came שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there בְּשִׁלֹֽה׃ <WH7887> in Shiloh

גַּם֮ <WH1571> Also בְּטֶרֶם֮ <WH2962> before יַקְטִר֣וּן <WH6999> Also before they burnt אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֵלֶב֒ <WH2459> the fat וּבָ֣א ׀ <WH935> came נַ֣עַר <WH5288> servant הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <WH3548> the priest's וְאָמַר֙ <WH559> and said לָאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> to the man הַזֹּבֵ֔חַ <WH2076> that sacrificed תְּנָ֣ה <WH5414> Give בָשָׂ֔ר <WH1320> flesh לִצְל֖וֹת <WH6740> to roast לַכֹּהֵ֑ן <WH3548> for the priest וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> he will not יִקַּ֧ח <WH3947> for he will not have מִמְּךָ֛ <WH4480> at בָּשָׂ֥ר <WH1320> flesh מְבֻשָּׁ֖ל <WH1310> sodden כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo חָֽי׃ <WH2416> of thee but raw

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> about הָאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> And [if] any man קַטֵּ֨ר <WH6999> unto him Let them not fail יַקְטִיר֤וּן <WH6999> to burn כַּיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> presently הַחֵ֔לֶב <WH2459> the fat וְקַ֨ח־ <WH3947> and [then] take לְךָ֔ כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after תְּאַוֶּ֖ה <WH8378> dainty נַפְשֶׁ֑ךָ <WH5315> [as much] as thy soul וְאָמַ֥ר ׀ <WH559> then he would answer [לֹו כ] (לֹא֙ ק) כִּ֚י <WH3588> inasmuch עַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> now תִתֵּ֔ן <WH5414> him [Nay] but thou shalt give וְאִם־ <WH518> If לֹ֖א <WH3808> No לָקַ֥חְתִּי <WH3947> [it me] now and if not I will take בְחָזְקָֽה׃ <WH2394> [it] by force

וַתְּהִ֨י <WH1961> Thus חַטַּ֧את <WH2403> Wherefore the sin הַנְּעָרִ֛ים <WH5288> of the young men גְּדוֹלָ֥ה <WH1419> great מְאֹ֖ד <WH3966> was very אֶת־ <WH853> פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD כִּ֤י <WH3588> for נִֽאֲצוּ֙ <WH5006> abhorred הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH582> for men אֵ֖ת <WH853> מִנְחַ֥ת <WH4503> the offering יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וּשְׁמוּאֵ֕ל <WH8050> But Samuel מְשָׁרֵ֖ת <WH8334> ministered אֶת־ <WH853> פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD נַ֕עַר <WH5288> [being] a child חָג֖וּר <WH2296> girded אֵפ֥וֹד <WH646> ephod בָּֽד׃ <WH906> with a linen

וּמְעִ֤יל <WH4598> coat קָטֹן֙ <WH6996> him a little תַּעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> made לּ֣וֹ אִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> Moreover his mother וְהַעַלְתָ֥ה <WH5927> and brought ל֖וֹ מִיָּמִ֣ים ׀ <WH3117> [it] to him from year יָמִ֑ימָה <WH3117> to year בַּֽעֲלוֹתָהּ֙ <WH5927> when she came up אֶת־ <WH854> with אִישָׁ֔הּ <WH376> with her husband לִזְבֹּ֖חַ <WH2076> to offer אֶת־ <WH853> זֶ֥בַח <WH2077> sacrifice הַיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> the yearly

וּבֵרַ֨ךְ <WH1288> blessed עֵלִ֜י <WH5941> And Eli אֶת־ <WH853> אֶלְקָנָ֣ה <WH511> Elkanah וְאֶת־ <WH853> אִשְׁתּ֗וֹ <WH802> and his wife וְאָמַר֙ <WH559> and said יָשֵׂם֩ <WH7760> give יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> The LORD לְךָ֥ זֶ֙רַע֙ <WH2233> thee seed מִן־ <WH4480> at הָאִשָּׁ֣ה <WH802> of this woman הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> in תַּ֚חַת <WH8478> place הַשְּׁאֵלָ֔ה <WH7596> for the loan אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which שָׁאַ֖ל <WH7592> which is lent לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> to the LORD וְהָלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> And they went לִמְקֹמֽוֹ׃ <WH4725> unto their own home

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> And פָקַ֤ד <WH6485> visited יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> חַנָּ֔ה <WH2584> Hannah וַתַּ֛הַר <WH2029> so that she conceived וַתֵּ֥לֶד <WH3205> and bare שְׁלֹשָֽׁה־ <WH7969> three בָנִ֖ים <WH1121> sons וּשְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> and two בָנ֑וֹת <WH1323> daughters וַיִּגְדַּ֛ל <WH1431> grew הַנַּ֥עַר <WH5288> And the child שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <WH8050> Samuel עִם־ <WH5973> before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

וְעֵלִ֖י <WH5941> Now Eli זָקֵ֣ן <WH2204> old מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> was very וְשָׁמַ֗ע <WH8085> and heard אֵת֩ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after יַעֲשׂ֤וּן <WH6213> did בָּנָיו֙ <WH1121> all that his sons לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> unto all Israel וְאֵ֤ת <WH853> אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> they יִשְׁכְּבוּן֙ <WH7901> and how they lay אֶת־ <WH854> with הַנָּשִׁ֔ים <WH802> with the women הַצֹּ֣בְא֔וֹת <WH6633> that assembled פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> [at] the door אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> of the congregation

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said לָהֶ֔ם לָ֥מָּה <WH4100> Why תַעֲשׂ֖וּן <WH6213> unto them Why do כַּדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> dealings הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> such אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> that אָנֹכִ֤י <WH595> I שֹׁמֵ֙עַ֙ <WH8085> hear אֶת־ <WH853> דִּבְרֵיכֶ֣ם <WH1697> things רָעִ֔ים <WH7451> of your evil מֵאֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> by all this people אֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> these

אַ֖ל <WH408> No בָּנָ֑י <WH1121> Nay my sons כִּ֠י <WH3588> for לֽוֹא־ <WH3808> is not טוֹבָ֤ה <WH2896> for [it is] no good הַשְּׁמֻעָה֙ <WH8052> report אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> I שֹׁמֵ֔עַ <WH8085> that I hear מַעֲבִרִ֖ים <WH5674> to transgress עַם־ <WH5971> people יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> ye make the LORD'S

אִם־ <WH518> If יֶחֱטָ֨א <WH2398> sin אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> If one man לְאִישׁ֙ <WH376> against another וּפִֽלְל֣וֹ <WH6419> shall judge אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> the judge וְאִ֤ם <WH518> if לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> against the LORD יֶֽחֱטָא־ <WH2398> sin אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> him but if a man מִ֖י <WH4310> who יִתְפַּלֶּל־ <WH6419> who shall intreat ל֑וֹ וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> not יִשְׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> for him? Notwithstanding they hearkened לְק֣וֹל <WH6963> not unto the voice אֲבִיהֶ֔ם <WH1> of their father כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for חָפֵ֥ץ <WH2654> would יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> because the LORD לַהֲמִיתָֽם׃ <WH4191> slay

וְהַנַּ֣עַר <WH5288> And the child שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <WH8050> Samuel הֹלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> on וְגָדֵ֖ל <WH1432> grew וָט֑וֹב <WH2896> and was in favour גַּ֚ם <WH1571> both עִם־ <WH5973> with יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> both with the LORD וְגַ֖ם <WH1571> both עִם־ <WH5973> and with אֲנָשִֽׁים׃ <WH376> men ס

וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> And there came אִישׁ־ <WH376> a man אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God אֶל־ <WH413> to עֵלִ֑י <WH5941> unto Eli וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> unto him Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD הֲנִגְלֹ֤ה <WH1540> Did I plainly נִגְלֵ֙יתִי֙ <WH1540> appear אֶל־ <WH413> about בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> unto the house אָבִ֔יךָ <WH1> of thy father בִּֽהְיוֹתָ֥ם <WH1961> were in בְּמִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> when they were in Egypt לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> to the house פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> in Pharaoh's
